title: Does riot OCE do anything about people who obviously bought boosts?
body: Not overly salty about it, though its definitely  there, but does riot do anything to ban people like this?

replies.body: Yeah, it seems like they brought it. But again, you don't have any concrete proof, and if Riot went around banning people just because they were playing 'bad', what sort of image would they betray to people who might potentially join the game?
